Name: Block_Quotes
Nolita: ['This sought after neighborhood is surrounded by some of the finest art galleries, shops, restaurants and night clubs in Manhattan. Start your day with a coffee at one of the unique coffee shops and end your day with a drink at one of the many amazing bars close by.', "It is situated between Little Italy and Soho, there is everything you need to enjoy NYC (fancy restaurants, amazing shops, metro station and also Eileen's Cheesecake, best cheesecake ever!)."]

Name: Lede
Nolita: As the trendiest little neighborhood you're still hearing about, Nolita combines the sophisticated allure of designer boutiques with the simple pleasure of people-watching from front stoops. This fashionable and friendly neighborhood is composed of narrow streets, picture-perfect window displays, and sidewalk cafes that invite you to indulge in a cup of fine espresso. Easily walkable and cozily quaint, Nolita faces no competition when it comes to cool hotspots.

Name: Photo_Headers
Nolita: ['Where Every Sidewalk Is a Catwalk', "Nolita's Charming Interiors, Exteriors, and Spaces In-Between", 'Nolita: Known for Good Eats and Perfect Cafes']

Name: Intro
Nolita: Romance and reality collide in this movie-set worthy New York City neighborhood.
